name: Why Did The Clown Cross The Road?
name_original: Why Did The Clown Cross The Road?
description:
Cross the terrains
Collect the balloons
Avoid being hit
---------------------------------
As in Life you can You can't go backwards
Score for distance and balloons collected
---------------------------------
WAD or Arrows to move
---------------------------------

Can you get onto the High Score Table?

Note: High Score table may be tidied/reset/archived periodically
--------------------------------

Mini prototype game created for the Toady Froggerson Quest as part of GameDev.Tv "Unity Challenge Club" starting to roll out live as of mid April 2021
